description: Number of multiples of 3 in 0..2^n-1 with an even sum of base 2 bits.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (2,4,-8,-3,6).
mathematica: Sum[ Sum[ Binomial[ Floor[ n/2 ], i ], {i, r, n, 6} ]*Sum[ Binomial[ Ceiling[ n/2 ], i ], {i, r, n, 6} ], {r, 0, 5} ]
author: _Dan Hoey_
